text: @NikkiHaley 45 million tests for 325 million people is a disgrace. Allowing COVID-19 to spread unchecked infecting 3.5 million people and killing 137 thousand within 5 months is bioterrorism/negligent homicide. Odd how Republicans are *concerned* about everything but THIS PANDEMIC.
